description.english: Survive 15 minutes in the Desert, Block, and Swamp.
description.schinese: 在沙漠、街区、沼泽地图游戏时间均超过20分钟

description.english: Triggered after using Phil more than 60 minutes and triggered after using Phil 20 minutes in the Desert, kill any boss, and get the ? which randomly appear in the visible range on the map, get unlocked.
